LanguageData.ZP_PestleAndMortar.label: Kineusu
LanguageData.ZP_PestleAndMortar.description: Kine (pestle) and Usu (mortar) for making Mochi. With this colonists can make Mochi in large quantities.

LanguageData.ZP_PestleAndMortar_Frame.label: Kineusu (building)
LanguageData.ZP_PestleAndMortar_Frame.description: Kine (pestle) and Usu (mortar) for making Mochi. With this colonists can make Mochi in large quantities.
